text: Baninqwenelela ukuba nilahle ukholo nina njengoko nabo balulahlayo, nize ngaloo ndlela nifane nabo. Ke nina musani ukubathabatha nibenze iitshomi zenu de bafuduke ngokwecebo lika-All√¢h (baye kuMuhammad eMadinah), kodwa ukuba baye bakreqa (kwi-Islam), babambeni nibabulalele naphi na apho nibafumana khona. Kananjalo ningabathabathi (abanye babo nibenze) iitshomi nabancedisi (benu) kubo
